ygData.subject: Re: Books
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/6/99 9:59:50 PM Eastern Daylight Time, sdunn@calpoly.edu ... translated ... Old ... go ... Well, other classes will sue runes you do not.
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/6/99 9:59:50 PM Eastern Daylight Time, sdunn@...
writes:

> From: sdunn@...
>
> So far I've bought all of the wizard series of research books and
translated
> them. I only counted about 25 or so spells in them. All of them are in
Old
> Erudian.
>
> I know there has to be more, I have a rune right now that doesn't seem to
go
> with any of the spells lists I've been given.

Well, other classes will sue runes you do not. Meaning, one of the other
calsses may need it :)

> Plus according to the book, On
> Languages, there are books writen in Combine, Dragon and Elder Dragon.
>
> Anyone know where to find these?

Not exactly... but probably NOT in any guild. I have heard of finding spells
in weird places, and such as Ocean of tears. So I expect spell research
books will be scattered about.

You are lucky... I am a necro, my first book is in Elder elvish... the three
other books I have found are in another language (I am guessing it will be
Elder Tir'Dal)

Sonoroud Tomebinder.
